name: Ascension (itch) (Erkberg)
description:
A building strategy bullet hell about becoming a god.  

~ Controls ~
Mouse to summon believers and heal them  
WASD or ZQSD to move  
MouseWheel or left shift and space to rotate

~ Special thanks ~
My beloved co-jammers guckstift (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/shelter) and grimgraybeard and my dearest tester Mör

~ Tools used ~
Unity, Blender, FL Studio (VST: DSK Overture), Audacity, jfxr

~ Timelapse ~
